errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.passwordTooCommon: Password is too common. Please choose a more secure one.
errors.invalidUsername: Username must be minimum 6 characters, letters & numbers only.
errors.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 6 characters long.
errors.usernameInvalidCharacters: Username can only contain letters and numbers.
errors.invalidFirstName: Please enter a valid first name.
errors.invalidLastName: Please enter a valid last name.
errors.emailRegisteredWithSocialLogin: This email is already registered with {{provider}} sign-in. Please use {{provider}} to log in or use a different email.
errors.emailRegisteredWithEmailLogin: This email is already registered with an email and password. Please use your email and password to log in or use a different email.

login.loginToAccount: Log in to your account to continue.

signup.createAccount: Create your account to get started.
signup.thanksForSigningUp: Thanks for signing up. Please check your inbox to verify the email.

emailVerification.successLogin: Email verified. Log in to your account to continue.
emailVerification.failed: Email verification failed. However, you can resend the confirmation email.
emailVerification.emailSent: Verification email sent successfully. Please check your inbox to verify the email.

passwordReset.enterEmail: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
passwordReset.emailSent: Password reset email is sent if you already have an account with this email address.
passwordReset.success: Password reset successful. Log in to your account to continue.
